info.title: College Basketball Data API
info.description: This API is in limited Beta for Patreon subscribers. It may have bugs and is subject to changes. API keys can be acquired from the CollegeFootballData.com website.

get.description: Retrieves list of available venues
Retrieves historical team information
Retrieves team roster information
Returns all player substitutions for a given game
Retrieve all player substitutions for a given player and season
Retrieve all player substitutions for a given team and season
Returns team season statistics by year or team

parameters.description: Optional season filter, required if team is not provided
parameters.name: season

parameters.description: Optional team name filter, required if season is not provided
parameters.name: team

get.description: Retrieves team season shooting statistics

parameters.description: Team filter, required if conference is not provided
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Conference abbreviation filter, required if team is not provided
parameters.name: conference

get.description: Returns player statistics by season
Retrieves player season shooting statistics

parameters.description: Team filter, required if conference is not provided
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Conference abbreviation filter, required if team is not provided
parameters.name: conference

get.description: Retrieves historical composite player recruiting ranking and ratings
Retrieves SRS ratings for the provided season, team, or conference.
Retrieves adjusted efficiency ratings for the provided season, team, or conference.
Retrieves historical poll data
Returns all plays for a given game

parameters.description: Optional filter to only return shooting plays
parameters.name: shootingPlaysOnly

get.description: Retrieve all plays for a given player and season

parameters.description: Optional filter to only return shooting plays
parameters.name: shootingPlaysOnly

get.description: Retrieve all plays for a given team and season

parameters.description: Optional filter to only return shooting plays
parameters.name: shootingPlaysOnly

get.description: Retrieve all plays for a given UTC date

parameters.description: Required date filter in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Optional filter to only return shooting plays
parameters.name: shootingPlaysOnly

get.description: Retrieve all plays for a given tournament and season

parameters.description: Required tournament filter (e.g. NCAA, NIT, etc)
parameters.name: tournament

parameters.description: Optional filter to only return shooting plays
parameters.name: shootingPlaysOnly

get.description: Retrieve list of play types
Queries lineup statistics for a given team and season
Queries lineup statistics for a specific game
Returns betting lines for the first 3000 games that match the provided filters, ordered by start date.

parameters.description: Optional start timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: startDateRange

parameters.description: Optional end timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: endDateRange

get.description: Returns information on the first 3000 games that match the provided filters, ordered by start date.

parameters.description: Optional start timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: startDateRange

parameters.description: Optional end timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: endDateRange

parameters.description: Optional tournament filter (e.g. NCAA, NIT, etc)
parameters.name: tournament

get.description: Returns broadcast information on the first 3000 games that match the provided filters, ordered by start date.

parameters.description: Optional start timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: startDateRange

parameters.description: Optional end timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: endDateRange

parameters.description: Optional tournament filter (e.g. NCAA, NIT, etc)
parameters.name: tournament

get.description: Returns team box score statistics and metrics on the first 3000 games that match the provided filters, ordered by start date.

parameters.description: Optional start timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: startDateRange

parameters.description: Optional end timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: endDateRange

parameters.description: Optional tournament filter (e.g. NCAA, NIT, etc)
parameters.name: tournament

get.description: Returns player box score statistics and metrics on the first 1000 games that match the provided filters, ordered by start date.

parameters.description: Optional start timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: startDateRange

parameters.description: Optional end timestamp in ISO 8601 format
parameters.name: endDateRange

parameters.description: Optional tournament filter (e.g. NCAA, NIT, etc)
parameters.name: tournament
